mapper.select: select count(*) as total from gacha_cn_301 where uid = #{uid}
select count(*) as total from gacha_cn_302 where uid = #{uid}
select count(*) as total from gacha_cn_200 where uid = #{uid}

select rank_type, name, item_type, uid, id, `time`, count from ( select rank_type, name, item_type, uid, id, `time`, rank() over ( order by id) as count from gacha_cn_${code} g where uid = #{uid}) t where t.rank_type = 5
select count(id) as count, rank_type, item_type from gacha_cn_${code} where uid = #{uid} group by rank_type, item_type order by rank_type, item_type asc
SELECT sum( table_rows ) AS count FROM information_schema.`tables` WHERE table_name = 'gacha_cn_200' OR table_name = 'gacha_cn_301' OR table_name = 'gacha_cn_302';

SELECT b.NAME, count( b.NAME ) AS count FROM ( SELECT NAME , item_type, rank_type FROM ( SELECT NAME, item_type, rank_type FROM gacha_cn_301 WHERE uid = #{uid} AND item_type = '角色' ) a UNION ALL ( SELECT NAME, item_type, rank_type FROM gacha_cn_200 WHERE uid = #{uid} AND ( item_type = '角色' OR ( item_type = '武器' AND rank_type = '5' )) ) UNION ALL ( SELECT NAME, item_type, rank_type FROM gacha_cn_302 WHERE uid = #{uid} AND ( item_type = '角色' OR ( item_type = '武器' AND rank_type = '5' )) ) ORDER BY item_type DESC, rank_type DESC ) b GROUP BY b.NAME
